title: HUGE!!! NativeTwitch Update
mainfeature: Complete UI / UX Overhaul, Read Release Notes

image.title: App UI / UX Got HUGE Update
image.description: The app stays in your menu bar, tucked away and hidden untill you decide to use it. It uses almost no resources when tucked away.

image.title: SUPER DUPER.. Secure AF
image.description:
NOTE: **All settings have been reset, Including your ClientID and AccessToken**
 The app now stores your credentials in Keychain. I'd recommended you to revoke your old accessToken and create a new one!!!

image.title: New ICON
image.description: The app icon is changed! Looks better than a blob imo.
